document.full_text: the first readings from american data-collection flights over the stricken fukushima daiichi nuclear plant in japan show that the worst contamination has not spread beyond the 19-mile range of highest concern established by japanese authorities.
document.title: radiation spread seen; frantic repairs go on
lines_and_colors: the first readings from american data-collection flights over the stricken fukushima daiichi nuclear plant in japan show that the worst contamination has not spread beyond the 19-mile range of highest concern established by japanese authorities.
